main event: A bright light with red and white flashing lights was observed hovering approximately 50-75 feet off the ground.
interesting points: The object was approximately 10-15 feet in diameter., The light appeared to be pulsing and metallic in nature., The object moved away, causing the light to dim and appear smaller., It was observed for approximately 15-30 seconds., The report suggests the possibility of the object being an aircraft or meteor.
sighted object: bright light with red and white flashing lights
witness description: Lt. Col. W. P. Craddock, Lt. Col. R. W. Haney, Sgt. L. P. Massey, and possibly others
